channel.title: More than 1 player using a command
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I'm using Devolution and I would like the pickup command allowed only for "theif" and "youhax". How would i do this. I only need the first line of code.
All help is appreciated Thanx! :)

item.title: More than 1 player using a command
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Lol Stanyer your stupid error fix didn’t work, wheres your proof of your server. I don’t give a fuck if you say you’ve made a server from scratch, who can’t? Whether it’s good or not is the question, and judging by the way you think you know how to fix that “Simple error” and you can’t really shows you have no idea.

Oh and magma gtfo, you two are both useless. Either of you have helped.

Oh btw thanx Zubmage for help.

Topic closed.

Read full topic

item.title: More than 1 player using a command
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

akanaz:

Lol you clearly have nothing, you use my terminology against me, everyone knows what i mean, there is no real use, I’m used to saying coding so it will take some time for me to start instinctively saying programming. Lol, what java programming skills? you just proved yourself useless in flaming because you claim to have already answered my question when it is the total wrong answer. I don’t think you have any proof of this programming skill of yours because so far you are making yourself to be a cocky, unexperienced programmer. To back that up you think your programming skill is legendary, most topics I see you post in are either wrong or spam. Who’s the “little retarded kid” now? Could you please gtfo my topic because you’ve proven to everyone what your worth. Kthxbai.

Unexperienced? Like i said before make a server from scratch, then compare it to my custom server.

Also if you knew how to fix simple errors you could fix this & my fix works anyway.

Read full topic

item.description:
@kevin-net2 wrote:

i think i can bring you abit further

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("thief"))

and make a second pickup command and make it this way

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("youhax"))

kevin
